Description:
Instantly Inviting, Perfectly Presented, Marvellous Moorcroft Officer
Located in one of Officers most desired estates Potters Grove, in close proximity to Beaconsfield and Officer town centres, St Francis Xavier College, Arena Shopping Plaza, Cardinia train station and M1 access!
This 2 years young home situated in a friendly quiet street opposite to parkland, this modern home has plenty of street appeal.
Comprising three generous sized bedrooms including master with ensuite and walk in robe and two remaining bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
The modern kitchen exudes quality with stone bench tops, walk in pantry, stainless steel oven and dishwasher!
The open plan living makes entertaining a breeze and leads out to your very own alfresco and backyard complete with turf and low maintenance gardens.
Other features of the home are as follows, ducted heating and split system air-conditioned cooling, double garage, 5KW solar power system, security alarms,CCTV camera, quality blinds and carpets. Plenty to offer for the first home buyer, downsizer, retiree or investor.
Make a time to inspect today!
Insights: 16 Moorcroft Terrace, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
5 BED, 3 LIVING, 2-YEAR-OLD CARLISLE BEAUTY IN OFFICER!
Relax or entertain in this modern brilliantly located family home..
If you've done your homework and know the value of buying in growth corridors, this 30SQ approx. URL Carlisle built home demands your attention. For the savvy investor, first home buyer or family, the Officer Postcode presents an opportunity not to be missed. Positioned on a corner block with potential side access for caravan parking on concrete, this 507SQM approx. flat block faces North with all living areas oriented for the evening sun.
This modern floorplan with high ceilings centres around a relaxing alfresco area, with both the formal lounge and main family area surrounding it. Add to this the rumpus/home theatre room and all the needs of a large family can be effortlessly managed in comfort. The master bedroom has a dressing area, rear wall robe and ensuite with shower and dual vanities, while the remaining 4 bedrooms all have built-in robes and share the main bathroom with shower and bath. The kitchen is the heart of any home and this is no exception, featuring black Caesar stone benches, glass splashback, 90cm freestanding cooker, dishwasher and an Island bench for casual breakfasts.
Zoned for the recently opened Officer Secondary College that's just minutes away, you also have easy access to Cardinia train station, the freeway and 2 local shopping centres.
Inclusions: GDH, evaporative cooling, NBN connection, LED lights, implement shed and double remote garage with internal access. Don't miss this compelling property, call now to arrange your immediate inspection.
Insights: 19 Crimson Street, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Look no further than this immaculately presented 3-bedroom Simonds prestige home.
Luxury family living in the prestigious Officer Potters Grove estate with shops, transport and schools within short distance, this exquisite home has been finished to an exceptionally high standard and boasts three bedrooms, two bathrooms and incredible low maintenance living.
Only 12 months young, The Metro is complete with stunning master bedroom, walk in robe and stone ensuite and a further two bedrooms finished with built in robes. An elegant living area boasting bamboo flooring and views to the courtyard overlooks the gourmet kitchen, showcasing a cooks freestanding s/steel oven and cooktop, dishwasher, endless space in the open butlers pantry and a huge bench with stunning stone benchtops. Family meals open out to the alfresco patio under the roof line - perfect for year-round entertaining.
With a host of luxuries only a visit will uncover, including single garage with internal access, ducted heating and split system cooling, quality blinds, fans, fully fitted laundry, double glazed windows and low maintenance landscaped gardens. Dont delay, this is the one!

Description:
MODERN LIVING ON A GENEROUS BLOCK
Situated on over a 700m2 allotment of land, this stunning four-bedroom home, plus study has been meticulously built to perfection and immaculately presented with neutral tones to create a stylish, modern ambience.
The property commences with a striking facade and flows through to the family friendly floor plan boasting four generous bedrooms, an oversized master showcasing double stone vanity to the en-suite and walk in robes, with all secondary rooms featuring built in’s.
The fully appointed, designer kitchen will delight the fussiest of cooks boasting quality appliances, stone benches, walk in pantry and generous cupboard spaces. The family’s living zones have been catered for with the formal lounge, generous open plan dining and family room, which leads out to the alfresco and rumps room.
Additional desired features include, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, bi-fold doors to the outdoor areas, double remote garage with direct entry and stunning established gardens.
All of this is located in the exclusive and sought after location of Grandvue Estate, walking distance to Officers shopping complex, quality schools, public transport and in close proximity to the freeway making for convenient living.
For further information or to inspect this lovely home contact Jeanine on 0438 332 411.

Description:
Savannah Officer - On the Cusp of Beaconsfield Double storey House & Land packages now 80% sold out - secure your new home today!'
This beautiful double storey house is perfect for young couples, growing families, or those looking to downsize. The first floor comprises of three bedrooms, two with built in robes and master with walk in robe and ensuite. The ground floor comprises of an open plan living and dining area overlooking the courtyard. You'll also find a formal sitting room which can be used as a study or extra bedroom if needed - the choice is yours! With two bathrooms and an extra powder room, there's plenty of space for everyone to get ready in the mornings. Other features include a double garage, Caesarstone benchtops and stainless steel appliances to deck out your new kitchen. Add your personal touch and customise your property with a range of interior colour schemes and materials to choose from.
Milli Terraces offers 20 houses on compact land within the Savannah Estate, each architecturally designed to take advantage of the stunning natural light and green surrounds. On individual title, no body corporate fees. Get in quick to secure your preferred floor plan, with selected properties offering a breathtaking outlook over the neighbouring reserve.
Set in the suburb of Officer, the newly released Milli Terraces is just a 45 minute drive from Melbourne CBD. Here you can enjoy living in a friendly, close knit community without sacrificing the convenience of city life.
Wide green spaces border onto tree lined streets, while a plentitude of cafes, shopping precincts and quality education facilities are on your doorstep.
Get in quick - Call Arvind now on 0421 691 765 to secure your home within this exclusive development.

Description:
Modern Townhouse!... Rented at $350 p/w!!!
Young, modern & with your own access!.. Located in the lovely Arena Estate within close proximity of Arena Shopping Centre, Pakenham Lakeside Primary School, Cardinia Road Train Station, Princes Freeway and Parkland! Currently rented out at approx. $350 per week until August this year with a secure tenant making it an ideal investment opportunity or a place to call home once the lease ends!
As you enter you are greeted by the modern open plan living with a generous sized formal lounge room. Nearby is the hostess kitchen including dishwasher and breakfast bar overlooking the meals area. Ground floor also features the laundry and separate toilet!
Make your way upstairs where you'll find the retreat area, an ideal second living area/open study or multi-purpose area! Comprising of three good sized bedrooms, the master bedroom with built-in robe and full-en-suite with slide doors out to the balcony. Other bedrooms also featuring built-in robes and nearby the central bathroom and toilet.
Further inclusions are ducted heating, a split system air conditioner/ heater, internal access through to the double remote garage. Outdoors features a beautiful deck area and is nicely landscaped.
It's not often you get something so young in age at such an affordable price..Hurry, before it's too late!

Description:
Perfect starter in good location.
Located only minutes to the shops, Cardinia train station, M1 freeway and all of Pakenhams commodities, this property will make a nice addition to your investment portfolio or provide an affordable option for the first home buyer.
The 4 bedrooms home totalising approx. 18 square includes a master with ensuite and huge walk-in plus 3 additional bedrooms all with built-in robe, it also offers a practical open plan family-dining-kitchen living area. The kitchen is equipped with a 4 burner gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher and a large benchtop with plenty of space for food preparation. The house is very easy to maintain with a tiled floor from the front door right through to the main living area. Comfort is provided by central gas ducted heating and a reverse cycle air conditioner. The small backyard wont take much work to maintain whilst there is enough space on the side to build a small alfresco for outdoor entertainment. Finally, car accommodation is covered by a single garage with internal door, external back door plus an additional parking space in the driveway. Dont miss out on our next open for inspection for your chance to inspect and buy this property.

Description:
Your own private sanctuary
Step away from the hustle and bustle into this faultlessly presented bespoke home. Showcasing quality throughout this property offers open plan living & dining, master bedroom with ensuite and separate toilet, two further bedrooms, study, bathroom + powder room, alfresco and additional decking where you can relax and take in your surroundings.
The kitchen is the heart of the home; and with qstone benchtops, induction cooktop and 900mm stainless steel oven and dishwasher you are always central to the indoor dining/living areas featuring floor to ceiling glass doors and windows as well as the sheltered alfresco area accessed via timber stack and slide patio doors.
Other features include large entrance, double garage, ample storage and ducted heating.
Quietly located on a no through road this property is an excellent, low maintenance option for families, downsizers or city commuters alike. Close to Cardinia Road train station, shopping centres and schools, you can be on the freeway in less than 2 minutes or take a short stroll to the new Lakeside Bistro for dinner.

Sky’s the limit on Skyline Drive!
Situated in arguably Officers best Estate – Grandvue Estate and surrounded by exquisite homes and parklands, this makes for a very easy decision! Buy the land and start building your dream home in this premium estate of Officer. Enjoying an elevated position allowing views to Western Port Bay, this is certainly one of the best allotments on which to build your stunning residence.

Description:
Nest or Invest!
Located in one of Officers most desired estate Potters Grove, in close proximity to Beaconsfield and Officer town centres, St Francis Xavier College, Arena Shopping Plaza, Cardinia train station and M1 access!
Situated in a friendly Quiet Street nearby to parkland with a modern and elegant brick and rendered façade the home has plenty of street appeal.
Comprising three generous sized bedrooms including master with ensuite and walk in robe and two remaining bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Two separate living zones give every family member their own space to enjoy!
The modern kitchen exudes quality with island bench, oversized pantry, 900mm stainless steel oven, range hood and dishwasher!
The open plan living makes entertaining a breeze and leads out to your very own alfresco and grassy backyard complete with turf and low maintenance gardens.
Other features of the home are as follows, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, double garage, quality blinds and carpets!
Make a time to inspect today!

Description:
The Ultimate in Modern Day Living
When location is everything, look no further!
Situated in what locals would call the ultimate location, 23 Hammond Crescent Officer is waiting for you!
Located in the highly sought after Arena estate, walking distance to shops, schools and public transport, parks and more you will have everything at your fingers tips
Fantastically designed and tailored to modern day living, you can expect the highest of quality;
This stunning kitchen is truly the heart of the home. Open planned and welcoming in design, featuring; stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, island bench, ample storage space, tiled splashback, overhead cupboard space and more.
Situated downstairs is the open plan kitchen, dining and family room overlooking the secluded back yard, making it perfect for entertaining.
Upstairs are 3 great sized bedrooms, master with its own ensuite whilst the other rooms have share the main bathroom, there is also an extra living area, making it perfect if you are wanting your own time out.
Other features of the home include; hydronic heating, internal access from garage, blinds throughout, laundry, split system air conditioning and the best part all of this is available to you with no body corporate.
If you’re not only looking for a quality home in a sought after location but also an agent who will take the time to explain the buying process in detail, then call Nicola to arrange your private inspection today!

This 3 year young, immaculately maintained home is the epitome of easy living move in and enjoy with nothing to do.
Presenting with 4 bedrooms - Master with sizeable walk-through robe and stunning modern ensuite with huge stone vanity and ample storage. Remaining 3 bedrooms are all generously proportioned and are serviced by a functional, stylish and modern family bathroom.

The clever floorplan incorporates a hideaway study nook that can be completely closed away when not being used but is still big enough for the home office.
Outside you'll find a gorgeous alfresco, low maintenance yard, and garden shed surrounded by appealing gardens.

Description:
INSTANTLY APPEALING, LOCATION IS EVERYTHING!
Situated in the very desirable Arena estate in Officer, this delightful family home on approx. 543 sqm is certain to set hearts racing. Ensuring effortless contemporary living, this immaculately presented & fastidiously maintained home allows easy family living suiting those wanting a low maintenance lifestyle. With warm charm & modern neutral tones throughout you will feel right at home from the moment you lay eyes on the stunning faÃ§ade & front manicured gardens.
A family friendly floorplan offers separated living zones designed to suit everyone's needs. The master bedroom is spacious in size complete with separate his & hers WIRs with doors plus an ensuite with twin vanities & an oversized shower. The additional 3 bedrooms are generous in size, all have BIRs & are located towards the rear of the home.
The expansive kitchen is the centerpiece of the home overlooking the meals/family zone, boasting waterfall benchtops with plenty of storage space fitted with stainless steel appliances including a wall oven with separate grill & 900mm wide gas cooktop plus dishwasher.
Moving outdoors, the entertaining space is a dream - an open and inviting decked Alfresco complete with built in BBQ has the bonus of natural gas supply, ceiling fan and zip down cafÃ© blinds for all year round comfort. Beyond the grassed area lies the best cubby that is sure to be the envy of the street, set amongst a most secluded & private area from the neighbours - perfect for the younger kids to enjoy!
Some of the many extras include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, timber floors, superbly crafted cabinetry, LED lights, CCTV cameras, tinted windows & quality window furnishings. A 6m x 3m garden shed allows for tools & extra storage whilst the oversized garage boasts 2.4m high AND 2.4m wide clearance to the backyard via the rear remote roller door â?? suitable for tradies or those with boats, trailers or campervans. The current owners have created a wonderful & useful leafy outdoor space for all the family to enjoy with storage needs taken care of.
This home is a standout in a premium location - walking distance to the Arena shops/cafes & the local kindergarten/childcare facilities, the Monash freeway & train station only a short drive not to mention quality schools, sports grounds & stadiums. What an ideal opportunity for your family with literally nothing to do but move in and enjoy! Most impressive & certainly worth viewing, call Michael or Brenda today!

Description:
Prime Investment Opportunity - Arena Estate
Immaculately presented and perfectly located this stunning 3 bedroom town home is nestled quietly away in the ever popular Arena Estate Officer and is sure to please the most astute investor or home buyer alike.
Features of this stunning home include:
Upstairs:
- 3 Large bedrooms - Master with full ensuite and walk through robes
- Bedrooms 2 & 3 serviced by second bathroom
- Kids retreat area
- Private balcony
- Reverse Cycle A/C
Downstairs:
- Large open plan kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances
- Meals area and large open plan family room
- Double sliding doors opening out to a beautifully sun filled courtyard
- Reverse Cycle A/C
- Laundry, powder room and storage cupboard
- Double lock up garage with internal access
With Close proximity to Arena Plaza, St Francis Xavier College, Cardinia train station, M1 Freeway and all essential amenities the choice is simple!
Call Brad Townsend today to book your private inspection.

Description:
Immaculate as New Home in Sought After Location!
Look no further! This Immaculate property designed by "Inspired Homes" is just what you have been looking for. Only 1 1/2 years young and located in the popular Potters Grove Estate, the property offers easy access to Pakenham or Berwick and is walking distance to some of the best schools in the area and public transport. On offer are 3 bedrooms, the Master with large walk in robe and ensuite, 2 living areas or perhaps 4th bedroom, gorgeous central kitchen and dining area. No expense has been spared in the finishes of this home with high ceilings and doors, quality carpets and quality hardware in the bathrooms and kitchen. The entertainer will love the kitchen, decorated with contemporary and stylish colour scheme, fabulous mirrored splash-back, 900mm freestanding oven, stone bench tops and huge pantry. Continuing on the entertaining theme, the outdoor alfresco area has plenty of space for adults to relax and the kids will love playing and running around on the lush lawn. For vehicles you have a double remote garage with convenient indoor access and off street parking. This home will stand above the others and needs to be seen to be appreciated.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
20 Acre Hide Away
Offered 'For Sale' for the first time in over 40 years, this slice of paradise of 20 acres offers the whole family somewhere to fulfil their hobbies, whether it be gardening, equine pursuits, or simply enjoying peace and quiet. The home itself offers zoned living, including formal lounge and dining, plus informal living adjoining the updated kitchen, 4 bedrooms and two bathrooms. Outside caters for all leisurely interests and offers a myriad of shedding including, machinery shed, hayshed, double garage under roof line, plus stables which includes tack room, workshop area and additional machinery shed at the front for storing floats, trailers or quad bikes undercover. Year round water supply is assured for stock with a large spring fed dam, which pumps up to the large gravity fed water tank for water troughs and garden use. Further features include a round yard, cattle ramp, town water, open fire place to the formal living area and coonara to the living area plus air conditioning. All accessed via a sealed road and conveniently close to the Princes Highway and Monash Freeway – here is your chance to own your piece of paradise. Call today!
To view property video, please click the following link https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=znKV-SRuqrg&feature=youtu.be
